item.title: 8X73KH58KDHN
item.description: 8X73KH58KDHN - 60 primogems and five adventurer's experience (new!) TSUKINOARIKAE - five moonfall silver, 20k mora, two hero's wit, and two mystic enhancement ore GS63YTOO2X - 30k mora, three hero's wit, five mystic enhancement ore, three varunada lazurite slivers, and three teachings of moonlight DABHTY763DAZ - 20k mora, three hero's wit, and five mystic enhancement ore 7TBZAGPP2WRD - 160 geodes of replication, 2k mora, two hero's wit, and two mystic enhancement ore BLKS3198XVS2 - 10k mora, ten adventurer's experience, five fine enhancement ore, five jueyun chili chicken, and five stir-fried fish noodles P3GXX56W3VG9 - 60 primogems and five adventurer's experience GENSHINGIFT - 50 primogems and three hero's wit (this code works periodically)

item.title: Quests:
item.description: Quests: completing some good old-fashioned quests earns you primogems Events: each update, you get the opportunity to take part in a heap of Genshin Impact events that offer bountiful rewards, including a lot of primogems Completing character trials: testing out the five-star characters featured on the current Genshin Impact banners is an easy way to snag a couple of freemogems Chests: opening chests in-game is a great way to get primogems Shrines: unlocking shrines and fast-travel points can earn you primogems Achievements: these are objectives you can complete in-game, that also grant you primogems Daily Commissions: these unlock at Adventure Rank 12 and offer rewards for completion, such as primogems. If you complete all four daily commissions, you get a bonus Mail: Hoyoverse often gives away free primogems as promotions or to make up for lost maintenance time Starglitter and Stardust: you can use both Starglitter and Stardust to purchase Intertwined Fate and Acquaint Fate. It may not be primogems, but they give you wishes just the same
